attributes.description:
First impressions last in the all-new, all-conquering, Chery Tiggo 4 Pro 1.5T Elite 6MT. The Tiggo 4 Pro features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine.
Highly spec features include:
-	6 Safety Airbags
-	ISOFIX
-	ABS + EBD
-	Emergency Brake Assist
-	Electronic Stability Program
-	Traction Control System
-	Roll Stability Control
-	Electric Power Steering
-	Auto Hold + Hill Assist
-	Tyre Pressure Monitoring
-	PDC with Rear View Camera
-	Keyless Entry + Push Button Start
-	Cruise Control
-	Multi-function Steering Wheel with 4-way Adjustments
-	17” Alloy Wheels
-	 Sunroof
-	Red Brake Callipers
-	Roof Rails
-	Halogen Headlights
-	LED Daytime Running Lights
-	7” Colour TFT Cluster
-	Dual Zone Auto Aircon
-	Leather Seats with Leather Steering Wheel
-	Bluetooth Handsfree
-	10.25” Multimedia Touch Display
-	Intelligent Voice Control
-	Apple Car Play / Android Auto
-	Service Plan 5year / 60 000Km
-	Warranty 5year / 150 000Km
-	Engine Warranty 1 Million / 10 years
-	Roadside 5year Unlimited

attributes.description: ** New Spec ** First impressions last in the all-new, all-conquering, Chery Tiggo 4 Pro 1.5T Elite SE CVT. The Tiggo 4 Pro features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine. Highly spec features include: - 6 Safety Airbags - ISOFIX - ABS + EBD - Emergency Brake Assist - Electronic Stability program - Traction Control System - Roll Stability Control - Electric Power Steering - Auto Hold + Hill Assist -  Electronic Park Brake + Auto Hold - Tyre Pressure Monitoring - PDC with Rear View Camera - Tyre Pressure Monitoring - Rear Park Sensors - 360 Panoramic Camera - Keyless Entry + Push Button Start - Front Seatbelt Pretensioners - Lane Departure Warning - Blind Spot Detection - Front Collision Warning - Automatic Brake System - Rear Cross Traffic Alert -Intelligent High Beam Control - Lane Change Assist - Cruise Control - Multi-function Steering Wheel with 4-way Adjustments - 17” Alloy Wheels – Sunroof - Red Brake Callipers - Roof Rails - Automatic LED Headlights - LED Daytime Running Lights - Multi Colour Ambient Lights - 7” Colour TFT Cluster - Dual Zone Auto Aircon - Leather Seats with Leather Steering Wheel - Bluetooth Handsfree - 10.25” Multimedia Touch Display - Intelligent Voice Control - Apple Car Play / Android Auto - Service Plan 5year / 60 000Km - Warranty 5year / 150 000Km - Engine Warranty 1 Million / 10 years - Roadside 5year Unlimited
